headline: The Case for a One-Term President Biden
abstract: The quickest way to get a President Stacey Abrams or President Pete Buttigieg is to first elect a President Biden.
lead_paragraph: You may have heard an old crank in a big house ranting about appliances and unflushable toilets the other day. “Remember the dishwasher, you’d press it, boom — there’d be like an explosion,” he said, apropos of nothing. “Now you press it 12 times.”
